LightningComponentBundle.masterLabel: Multi Select Lookup with Data Table
LightningComponentBundle.description: Multi select lookup box that drives lightning datatable

property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: Enter the desired title of this instance of the component

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon Name
property.description: Enter the name of the icon to be used on the queried/selected records

property.name: fieldPaths
property.label: Field API names and field paths
property.placeholder: Ex: Id, Name, Phone, Email, Account.Name
property.description: Enter a comma delimited list of fields/paths to query

property.name: fieldPathsForSearch
property.label: Fields and field paths to base search off of
property.description: Enter a comma delimited list of fields/paths to base search off of (default is name)

property.name: whereClause
property.label: Where Clause
property.description: Optionally enter where clause to filter records. Do not include 'WHERE' in this field.

property.name: actionsStr
property.label: Actions
property.description: Optionally enter row actions to be added to the table

property.name: suppressBottomBar
property.label: Supress Bottom Bar
property.description: Optionally suppress the bottom bar that reveals the cancel and save button when a change is made to a cell

property.name: enforceAccessibleFls
property.label: Enforce Accessible FLS
property.description: Optionally enforce whether fields in the datatable are accessible through Field Level Security
